document_name: Approved Prodoc for PIMS  3227 GEF SLM.pdf

outputs.output_descr: Policies and institutional arrangements established to ensure that land tenure systems attract investment in SLM, a sustainable charcoal value chain is established and regulated, degraded lands are rehabilitated, ecosystems health is maintained and  improved land use plans and practices are adopted for  agricultural productivity increase and  livelihoods improvement.

project_descr: ENABLING ENVIRONMENT FOR SUSTAINABLE LAND MANAGEMENT(SLM) TO OVERCOME LAND EGRADATION IN UGANDA CATTLE CORRIDOR DISTRICTS
project_title: PIMS 3227ENABLING ENV. FOR SLM TO OVERCOME LAND DEGRAD'N
